WP Speakers
Find Speakers for Your WordPress Events




Free to search. Free to join.









About
WP Speakers is a free database of speakers available for  WordPress meetups, WordCamps, and other events.
If you’re a speaker – join the database.
If you’re organizing an event – search and get in touch with potential speakers.





The most Relatable speakers
WordPress is universal. No matter where you are, your event needs speakers that can relate to your WordPress audience. Search our database to find speakers who may be available for your online or in-person event. Search by location, topics, and expertise.
Search All Speakers







The Best Audiences
Whether speaking in person to a local meetup or online to a group halfway around the world, sharing your WordPress knowledge is an amazing thing!Join our database for free. Let organizers find you. Speak at their events!Add your bio, headshot, location, topics, and expertise.
Join the Database









Sponsored By
